archetypes.name: Conquistador
archetypes.description: Strategic, ambitious, driven by achievement and dominance in relationships.

archetypes.name: Siren
archetypes.description: Alluring, emotionally complex, seeks intensity and admiration.

archetypes.name: Magistrate
archetypes.description: Fair, principled, values equity and clear agreements in relationships.

archetypes.name: Devotee
archetypes.description: Loyal, self-sacrificing, deeply invested in relational continuity.

archetypes.name: Paladin
archetypes.description: Protective, principled, seeks to defend and elevate partners.

archetypes.name: Oracle
archetypes.description: Intuitive, introspective, values depth and psychological understanding.

archetypes.name: Jester
archetypes.description: Playful, adaptive, uses humor and lightness to navigate relationships.

archetypes.name: Muse
archetypes.description: Creative, inspiring, thrives on emotional and intellectual stimulation.

archetypes.name: Shaman
archetypes.description: Healer, transformative, seeks to integrate shadow and wholeness in love.

archetypes.name: Oasis
archetypes.description: Nurturing, grounding, offers emotional refuge and stability.

archetypes.name: Tyrant
archetypes.description: Commanding, controlling, uses power to maintain dominance and security.

archetypes.name: Martyr
archetypes.description: Self-effacing, sacrificial, finds identity through relational suffering.
